author: Staff Reporter
text:
An Armed Reserve police constable was arrested on a charge of snatching a gold chain from a woman here on Monday.

The arrested was identified as M. Rajadurai (26) of Uchampatti village in Usilampatti block in Madurai district. He is working as AR police constable in Madurai City. Rajadurai snatched the three-sovereign gold chain from R. Sukirdha (29), a nurse at a private hospital, when she was walking along Michael Nadar Street in the evening. Then he tried to escape from the spot. On hearing her cry, local people caught him and handed him over to the police.

During preliminary investigation, the police found that the arrested was a police constable. He had come to Theni on medical leave to meet a friend. He was produced before a local court and remanded in judicial custody.
title: Chain snatching: AR constable held
